definition:
H \*-algebra
------------

An *H $*$-algebra* is defined as a Hilbert space $\mathbb{A}_H$ equipped
with an associative unital algebra structure and an antilinear
involution $^*:\mathbb{A}_H \to \mathbb{A}_H$ which is compatible with
taking the adjoint of the operators on the Hilbert space for the left
and right multiplication of $\mathbb{A}_H$ with itself (ref. [@JB2k6]).

[9]{} Baez, J. 2007. (Preprint)
